An internal function to use Annoy algorithm via RcppAnnoy.

Source: R/method_annoy.R
method_annoy.Rd

See details of the RcppAnnoy package.

Usage

method_annoy(x, y, k, distance, verbose, seed, control)

Arguments

x

Deduplication or reference data.

y

Query data.

k

Number of neighbors to return.

distance

distance metric

verbose

If TRUE, log messages to the console.

seed

seed for the pseudo-random numbers algorithm.

control

controls for lsh or kd.

Details

Imports

Author

Maciej Beręsewicz
